about_the_game:
AI Pals Engine gives you access to powerful, real-time personal AI right on your Windows Desktop! It's your own personal AI assistant, no subscription required - use it as much as you want.
Your conversations are private and stay completely on your computer.


  • AI Desktop Widget – Talk to your AI right on your Desktop or in the built-in chat
  • Privacy First – Your data stays on your PC
  • No Monthly Fees – Unlimited Usage, enjoy forever!
  • Offline Availability – Operates directly on your computer, no internet required!
  • Enhanced Security – AI Pals Engine is built with your protection in mind
  • Full Control – As a sandbox, you can dive deep into your AI's settings if you wish
  • Library – Use pre-built, or configure your own AI Models and AI Characters
  • Customization – Extensive options for customizing your AI and Widgets
  • Advanced Features – Like AI Memory, Custom Python Function Calling and Group Chat
  • Text-To-Speech and Speech-To-Text – For a more convenient and immersive experience
  • Planned Workshop support – Share AI Characters, AI Avatars and Widget Themes


Create
– Draft emails or text messages
– Brainstorm creative ideas
– Simplify complex topics
– Summarize text or articles
– Create game characters or plots
– Compose lyrics
– Create tutorials
– Craft resumes and cover letters
– Prepare for job interviews
– Plan your next activities
– Write captivating stories
Power Up
– Learn how to Code, a new language, ...
– Gain different views on various topics
– Navigate and explore emotions
– Expand your vocabulary
– Explore philosophy
– Seek relationship advice
– DIY Troubleshooting
...and so much more - with this text based tool!

Let AI Pals Engine empower and entertain you. Don't forget to add it to your Wishlist to be notified when it launches.

name: AI Pals Engine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i9-10900K / AMD Ryzen 9 3900XT
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A minimum of 6GB of your system memory should be free.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i9-11900K / AMD Ryzen 9 5900X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3080
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Use your personal offline AI directly on your Desktop! AI Pals Engine is your text-based sandbox for unlimited roleplaying and more. Free of monthly subscriptions and complete privacy. Power up with local AI - Get your own virtual assistant today!
